title: Bug 7752: Export multiple files with same file name under different directories to zip file fails
description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Export multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file

OB: 

EB: The zip file should be able to store files with the same name under different directories

SR: 
- Create multiple files with the same name under different directories
- Select all the files
- Right-click and choose 'Export'
- Choose the destination as a zip file
- Click 'Export'
